hero.description: Worknova combines digital intelligence with personal guidance and supports companies in acquiring international skilled workers, while applicants find a secure start.
hero.secureDreamJob: Secure your dream job in Germany

dashboard.searchQuery: Search for Cloud Engineer profiles from South America.

targetGroups.headline: Together, companies and skilled workers reach
targetGroups.description: We combine personal support with efficient growth for a successful, shared future.
targetGroups.applicantsIntro: Rely on {{highlight}}, personal guidance and a secure start in your new work environment.
targetGroups.applicantsText1: With Worknova, you get access to carefully selected positions at German companies. You can navigate the application process digitally and easily, and strategically apply your skills.
targetGroups.applicantsText2: Our platform supports you with clear information, helpful features and reliable guidance through important steps, so you can confidently plan your professional path in Germany and prepare your fresh start.
targetGroups.applicantsHighlightBox: Discover suitable job offers and get a first impression of your professional opportunities.
targetGroups.companiesIntro: Rely on {{highlight}}, digital efficiency and sustainable support.
targetGroups.companiesText1: With Worknova, you get access to a carefully vetted pool of international skilled workers. Through the platform, you manage selection, communication and process steps clearly and efficiently.
targetGroups.companiesText2: Worknova supports companies with important procedures such as recognition, visa and communication with the relevant authorities and accompanies all parties through the entire recruitment process.
targetGroups.companiesHighlightBox: Create a solid foundation for sustainable growth and strengthen your profile as an attractive employer.

contact.title: Let's
contact.description: Do you have questions or would you like to learn more about Worknova? We look forward to hearing from you.
contact.successMessage: Thank you for your message. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.title: Questions &
faq.description: Everything you need to know about the recruitment process, recognition and getting started with Worknova.
faq.stillQuestionsDesc: Our team is happy to assist you and answer all your questions.

login.description: Sign in to manage your recruitment processes or find your job.
login.feature2: Stay connected with employers and talents.
login.feature3: Always up to date with real-time notifications.
login.successMessage: Welcome back. You will be redirected to the dashboard.

register.description: Start your digital recruitment journey or find your dream job in Germany.
register.feature1: Quick and easy registration in just a few steps.
register.feature2: Access to exclusive job matches or talents.
register.talentDesc: Find your dream job in Germany
register.successMessage: Thank you for registering. You can now log in.

services.title: The path to
services.description: From candidate search to successful integration – Worknova accompanies you every step of the way.

app.title: Career in
app.description: The Worknova app brings all features directly to your smartphone. Manage applications, communicate with employers and always stay up to date.
app.profileCreation: Your documents become a complete profile –
app.step01Desc: Simply hold your certificates and documents in front of the camera.
app.step02Desc: The AI reads all relevant data – error-free and in seconds.
app.step03Desc: Your complete profile is created automatically, optimized for recruiters.
app.step04Desc: Suitable positions find you – not the other way around. Push notification for every match.
app.resultDesc: No manual entries. No forgotten details. The AI captures everything – from qualifications to language skills to soft skills. Your profile is complete and professional from the first moment.

notFound.title: Page not
notFound.description: The requested page unfortunately does not exist. We apologize for the inconvenience.
